title: Elana Scherr - (Edmunds, Hot Rod, Roadkill)
description:
Elana Scherr has worked for all the magazines that require wrench turning, because she can. She wrote for Hot Road, was the editor of Road Kill, and has a collection of old cars in various states of repair that we can all aspire to. She dailes an Opel GT and a classic Challenger, and is one of the friendliest people in the business. She's here to talk about her new video projects on Edmunds. 

This show is also a video! https://youtu.be/VMn7e27MeLc

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @challengeher

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @challengeher
